eventText: Shaishav says that, ESC app has passed the local test (which was failed before). There is no video manager, calendar tool, get more section in this version, only all guidelines pre-packed. Mariona and Nathalie have gone through it and approved it.
Shaishav informed Sylvia that windows version of ESC app is approved and can be released on Monday, 19Feb.
Shaishav sends the app installation link to Sylvia.
Sylvia sends the changes for the ESC Windows app to Shaishav.
Shaishav has contacted Deepak for more graphics in soem new sizes.
Deepak prepares and sends back the required graphics.
Shaishav asks for ESC conference icon, Munich 2018.
Deepak is asking for an screenshot with Barcelona conference icon.
Deepak sends the screenshot graphics to Shaishav.
Shaishav tells that the app is approved and will be online in next few hours. Also, latest features will come online in next version in May. This delay is due to CE and hospital visits.
ESC windows version is online now.
